title: Display project field in tk show
description:
Update show command to display project field in cmd/show.go.

Implementation:
- Add Project line to text output (after Priority, before Parent)
- Include project in JSON output (already handled by struct tag)

Output format:
ID:          abc123
Title:       Task title
Type:        task
Status:      open
Priority:    2 (Medium)
Project:     2026-01-14-6453-auth    # NEW LINE
Parent:      def456

Test cases:
- Show tick with project displays it
- Show tick without project (empty or omitted)
acceptance_criteria: Project displayed in output, JSON includes field, tests pass
closed_reason: Added Project display to runShow output
